data.title: Things & That - Product design and development.
data.header: Building independent media products and services, and helping others do the same
data.body:
Hello, I'm a London based maker of products and services. In a world of ever confusing media and technology, Things & That helps brands, agencies, and individuals meet the future head-on with ethical and privacy-focused product design, development and insights. Future-enabling everyone.

Specialising in scalable e-commerce, content management and publishing, live video and streaming services, interactive media and audio.

projects.name: unalike
projects.title: Unalike. Giving stories a voice.
projects.summary: A publishing platform designed for writers, creators, journalists, and publishers, with tools that reimagine the way we create, publish, and own stories.
projects.label: www.unalike.net
